text:
Here’s an idea stop making the form field so so so so so so so long,  the user is just getting inundated with fields, personally I want nothing more than a dropdown to select the form and a thank you message. If you must insist on all the extra fields please collapse them by default!

Also make them work, if you add rich text inline in the form editor and then someone edits a field in the clunky inline interface it removes all the rich text and forms don’t have a revision history in HubSpot.
